ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 58
ygData.msgSnippet: i was assuming those 3 items were off of the great beast nagafen herself. the eq lizer paragraph leading up to the items said looks like theres been more
ygData.messageBody:
i was assuming those 3 items were off of the great beast nagafen herself.
the eq'lizer paragraph leading up to the items said "looks like theres been
more dragon slaying recently," and then proceeded to tempt us with 3
outstanding items.

learic lovejam
xegony


>Message: 7
> Date: Fri, 16 Jul 1999 16:54:41 -0700
> From: Andrew Beall <abeall@...>
>Subject: LJ and the quest for crook staff
>
>I have been hunting Lockjaw lately. I have got the kill on him 4 times in 2
>days. And he dropped the crook one time. I gave it to a friend to be nice
>since my 2H blunt is still at can't hit anything. BUT after seeing EQ'lizer
>and the new druid only crook. I REALLY want to get my skill up to a decent
>area. So I'd like to know how often LJ drops a crook. And if I need to step
>up the LJ hunt to get a crook.
>
>
>Slippin
>The Rathe
